ch0101_10_mei/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh! Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Looking good today! Is that a new hat?
ch0101_10_mei/0101_0701_02_10:
I don’t know what it is, but something about this
outfit always puts me in a good mood! I feel like
exploring! Wanna come with?
ch0101_10_mei/0601_0701_01_10:
Parties never stop being fun, no matter how
old you get.
ch0101_10_mei/0601_0701_02_10:
You get to play with tons of Pokémon, exchange
gifts with your friends... And the best part is...
ch0101_10_mei/0601_0701_03_10:
you get to eat all the yummy party food you want!
You’d have to be crazy to say no to that, right?!
ch0101_10_mei/0601_0701_04_10:
Wh-why are you looking at me like that?
You just compared me to a Munchlax in your
head, didn’t you? I—I just like food, OK?!
ch0101_10_mei/0601_0702_01_10:
I’ve met so many awesome sync pairs since
coming here to Pasio. I’d love to throw a
party with everyone!
ch0101_10_mei/0601_0702_02_10:
Don’t you think it would be fun?! We could make
so many amazing memories together!
ch0101_10_mei/0601_0702_03_10:
I’ll try to come up with some cool party
ideas, OK? Once I get everything set up,
you’ll be the first person I invite!
ch0101_10_mei/0602_0701_01_10:
You know how they call Delibird a Delivery
Pokémon? Well, mine likes to give me all sorts
of presents!
ch0101_10_mei/0602_0701_02_10:
It’s mostly just Berries and flowers, but it feels
kinda nice to get presents out of the blue like that.
ch0101_10_mei/0602_0701_03_10:
Although...the other day, I woke up from a nap
to find a cast-off Bug Pokémon shell in front of
my face.
ch0101_10_mei/0602_0701_04_10:
It was so freaky! Not exactly the kind of present
I’d choose to wake up to.
ch0101_10_mei/0602_0702_01_10:
The Bug Pokémon shell came as a bit of a shock,
but Delibird didn’t mean any harm by it.
ch0101_10_mei/0602_0702_02_10:
I made sure to say thank you to her, and she
gave me a little smile in return.
ch0101_10_mei/0602_0702_03_10: For me, that little smile was the real present.
ch0101_10_mei/0603_0701_01_10:
Since pairing up with Delibird, I learned something
super fun! Wanna know what it is?
ch0101_10_mei/0603_0701_02_10:
You know that big, white sack-looking thing
that Delibird carry around? Well...
That’s actually its tail!
ch0101_10_mei/0603_0701_03_10:
I never would’ve guessed that was part of
its body... Pokémon are so full of mystery!
ch0101_10_mei/0603_0702_01_10:
Did you know that Delibird store food in their
tails to feed to their chicks?
ch0101_10_mei/0603_0702_02_10:
Be careful not to accidentally touch one...
If they think you’re trying to steal their chicks’
food, they get reeeally angry.
ch0101_10_mei/0603_0702_03_10:
When it comes to protecting their chicks,
Delibird don’t mess around. But they’re
actually supernice Pokémon!
ch0101_10_mei/0604_0701_01_10:
Tee-hee!
Like my outfit? Siebold gave it to me.
ch0101_10_mei/0604_0701_02_10:
He told me that in some regions, this outfit
symbolizes the spirit of joy and giving. Pretty
nice, huh? I love the red-and-white combo.
ch0101_10_mei/0604_0701_03_10:
My favorite part is that I match Delibird now!
Tee-hee! You can totally tell we’re a sync pair!
ch0101_10_mei/0604_0702_01_10:
What? There are a bunch of other Pokémon
that are red and white, too?
ch0101_10_mei/0604_0702_02_10:
Let’s see... There’s Voltorb and Electrode...
Zangoose... Wurmple...
ch0101_10_mei/0604_0702_03_10:
I guess you’re right—I match a bunch of
different Pokémon in this outfit! It would be
so cool to form a group with all of them!
ch0101_10_mei/0605_0701_01_10:
Um, e-excuse me... Do you have a minute
or two? I’m looking for Trainers to answer
my questionnaire.
ch0101_10_mei/0605_0701_02_10:
OK, first question. Serious answers only, please...
What’s your favorite...cake flavor?
ch0101_10_mei/0605_0701_03_10:
D-don’t laugh! It’s a serious question! I asked
you for serious answers only, remember?
Tell me everything you like!
ch0101_10_mei/0605_0702_01_10:
Tee-hee! Thank you so much for answering
my questions! I really appreciate it.
ch0101_10_mei/0605_0702_02_10:
I don’t have anything with me right now...
But I’ll be sure to get you a thank-you
present soon, OK?
ch0101_10_mei/1701_0701_01_10: Oh! I’m so glad I caught you!
ch0101_10_mei/1701_0701_02_10:
Delibird gave this to me, but I already have
too many! Will you take it off my hands?
ch0101_10_mei/1701_0702_01_10:
Awww, I’m so glad you like it! Make sure you tell
Delibird thank you, too, OK?
ch0101_10_mei/1701_0702_02_10: If you do, she might bring you another present!
ch0101_10_mei/2501_0701_01_10:
I used to think that getting presents made people
way happier than giving them, but now I’m not
so sure.
ch0101_10_mei/2501_0701_02_10:
When you give someone a present, you get a
smile in return. I don’t know about you, but that
always gives me the warm fuzzies!
ch0101_10_mei/2501_0701_03_10:
Wait a sec... Wouldn’t that mean both the giver
and the receiver get something in the end?
Hmm... Either way, it feels nice!
ch0101_10_mei/2501_0702_01_10:
If you’re gonna give someone a present,
you should try to get them something they
really want, huh?
ch0101_10_mei/2501_0702_02_10:
I love seeing how happy my friends look when
they open a present I picked out specifically
for them!
ch0101_10_mei/2501_0702_04_10:
Say, if someone were to get you a present...
what sort of present would you want most?
J-just asking for a friend!
ch0101_10_mei/2511_0701_01_10:
Getting to pair up with a new Pokémon has
been really exciting, but it’s kinda made me
think about certain things.
ch0101_10_mei/2511_0701_02_10:
Does she like me? What does she think of me?
Am I giving her the right commands? For a while,
I couldn’t stop thinking about Delibird.
ch0101_10_mei/2511_0701_03_10:
But then I realized that the only way to find
answers was to ask her face-to-face!
ch0101_10_mei/2511_0701_04_10:
That’s the method I chose, and it’s been working
out pretty great so far!
ch0101_10_mei/2511_0702_01_10:
Have you ever thought about what it would be
like if we Trainers could speak Pokémon?
ch0101_10_mei/2511_0702_02_10:
I used to think it would be sooo amazing, but
recently my opinion’s sorta changed.
ch0101_10_mei/2511_0702_03_10:
Nowadays, I feel like as long as we can get our
feelings across, who needs words! That’s kinda
what it means to be a sync pair, right?
ch0101_10_mei/2511_0702_04_10:
Tee-hee! Watching you and your Pokémon
together is actually what helped me realize
that, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0101_10_mei/2511_0702_05_10:
I wanna spend even more time with Delibird!
The closer we get as friends and partners,
the better we’ll be able to communicate!
ch0101_10_mei/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Let’s get out there bright and early
and go spread some cheer!
ch0101_10_mei/3002_0701_01_10:
Oof... I can’t seem to wake up this morning.
Want to have a quick Pokémon battle?
That ought to do the trick.
ch0101_10_mei/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey there! Have you had lunch yet? If not, we
should grab something to munch on together!
ch0101_10_mei/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey! Wanna see if we can find a few sync pairs
itching to battle this afternoon? Now’s the perfect
time to head out!
ch0101_10_mei/3005_0701_01_10:
Phew! I think I might’ve overdone it a little with
the training today. I could go for another round
if you want to, though!
ch0101_10_mei/3006_0701_01_10:
Can you believe the day’s already almost over?
I wonder what kind of adventures are waiting for
us tomorrow!
